dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I was making my way into school and found an uncomfortable feeling running up my back.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: It felt like somebody was watching me.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: This continued the moment I got to school all the way to the end of the day.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Then as I was making my way to the gate to leave I noticed a girl standing there by the gate waiting for me.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: She was beautiful with a curvy figure and a great smile, but she also had red skin…and horns? Is that some kind of cosplay? I figured it was best to keep on walking and ignore her.
“It’s you…”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I froze. It felt like she was looking deep into my heart. All of a sudden the tattoo on my hand began to itch. The girl’s eyes however never left mine…
“Hello there. I have been looking all over for you. My destined one.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Destined one? What the hell is she talking about? Is she hitting on me? Even I wouldn’t have the guts to use that kind of line.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: The girl moves closer to me.
“My minions were wandering about the school looking for you. I spent the entirety of last year, and the year before hunting for my destined one.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: So this girl is a third year then? Even the students are this crazy?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Maybe it is love at first sight or something and she is trying to pass it off as a destined connection? Not that it is a normal thing to do, just that it wouldn’t surprise me considering this school’s teaching staff.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Not that it is a normal thing to do, just that it wouldn’t surprise me considering this school’s teaching staff.
“Please tell me your name.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “M-my name is Takeshi.”

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: “Takeshi-kun huh? My name is Lucci and I am the daughter of the greatest demon to ever exist. We are destined to be together.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: She is a demon? Is she being serious? It really looks like she believes what she is saying.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Destined to be together? What are you talking about?”

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: “My full name is Luccifer Darkness. I am the daughter of the devil Lucifer. I have come to this school looking for my destined husband, for you.”

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: “We will wed and bring forth the most powerful demon to ever exist and usher this world into a new age of darkness.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: ...What?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “...What?”

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: “Takeshi-Kun I understand you may be confused, but please allow me to show you exactly what I am talking about.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: The red-skinned girl clicks her fingers and suddenly my mind drifts to a destroyed version of the school.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I look around and see fire and destruction everywhere with weird wails and screams in the background.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Then I hear a voice...
“Hello Papa...”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I turn and see a giant red demon staring down at me with a loving look. It was a like a child staring at their parent.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Then the giant reached down to grab me and lift me up and I closed my eyes. There is no way this is going to end well!

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: “Did you see it?”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I open my eyes and I am back at the school. I notice a cold sweat run down my back...that was horrifying.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: “Did you see the beauty of the creature we create?”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I could see the glee in the girl’s eyes. She is really a demon no way that was anything normal.
